cleaned_text: Shop / Dog Food / Natural Balance L.I.D. Limited Ingredient Diets Beef & Brown Rice Formula Dry Dog Food Natural Balance Natural Balance L.I.D. Limited Ingredient Diets Beef & Brown Rice Formula Dry Dog Food $24.99 4 lb 12 lb 22 lb 4-lb 12-lb 22-lb Purchase Options Pick up in Store Not Available Set your store for inventory and store pickup details Zip Code Search Ship to Me Not Available Quantity Add To Cart Feeding guide disclaimer Feeding guides provide a starting point for the amount of food to give your pet each day. We recommend that you keep your pet in ideal body condition and not allow them to become overweight. The amount of food your pet needs can vary based on age, activity level or other food and treats given, so be sure to work with your veterinarian to determine an appropriate weight for your pet, and to make any necessary adjustments to their feeding. Information Ingredients Guaranteed Analysis Sometimes whats NOT in your dogs food is just as important as what is. Thats the guiding philosophy behind Natural Balance L.I.D. Limited Ingredient Diets Beef & Brown Rice Formula, a super premium dry dog food made to help feed your dogs greatness. Our beef and brown rice formula is made without commonly added ingredients like peas, corn, wheat or soy. Instead, you'll find real beef as the #1 ingredient and easily digestible whole grain brown rice. We also added essential vitamins and minerals to provide your adult dog with a complete and balanced diet to help support his nutritional needs. For dogs both big and small, the choice is simple: Natural Balance is what you need to feed them with confidence!Why We Love It Contains one (1) 12-pound bag of Natural Balance L.I.D. Limited Ingredient Diets Beef & Brown Rice Formula a super premium grain inclusive dog food formulated to meet the unique nutritional needs of your adult dog #1 ingredient is real beef, which provides essential amino acids that help maintain healthy muscles Made with wholesome grains, like brown rice, that help provide sustained energy About Natural BalanceNatural Balance has stood by their core beliefs since 1989, when Dick Van Patten founded the company with the philosophy of providing pets and their owners the Food for a Lifetime.. Surrounded around four core principles of premium quality ingredients, safety testing, highly trained nutrition experts, and 100% customer satisfaction, Natural Balance has become the most trusted name in pet nutrition. Natural Balance chooses only the tastiest and most nutritious ingredients to formulate their food, including high quality, lean proteins like lamb, venison, salmon and duck, and healthy carbohydrates such as sweet potatoes and garbanzo beans. Not a single Natural Balance formula contains artificial flavors, chemical preservatives, soy, wheat, or corn, by-product meals, or refined grains. Natural Balance is the only pet food company with the Buy With Confidence Program which allows you to see the safety test results of every bag or can of Natural Balance that is made. Every member of Natural Balance's customer care team is a highly trained vet technician with a degree in Animal Health Science. Couple all of these staples together, and the result is a 100% satisfaction guarantee that Natural Balance lives by. Beef, Beef Meal, Brown Rice, Brewers Rice, Rice Bran, Brewers Dried Yeast, Whole Grain Sorghum, Sunflower Oil, Natural Flavor, Flaxseed, Vitamins (Vitamin E Supplement, Ascorbic Acid (Source of Vitamin C), Niacin, Vitamin A Supplement, Thiamine Salt, Potassium Chloride, Minerals (Zinc Proteinate, Zinc Sulfate, Ferrous Sulfate, Iron Proteinate, Copper Sulfate, Copper Spearmint Extract.
